title: Swedish pickled herring
description: Pickled herring is popular in Northern Europe. Here we use classic Swedish flavours – capers, red onions, chives and bay – to create a simple, fresh-tasting starter.
ingredients: 10 salted herring fillets (about 1.3kg/3lb) rinsed, soaked in water overnight, drained
red onion, finely chopped, to garnish
handful chives, finely chopped chives, to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
